textContent:
Black market merchant that is stealthed calls you if you enter some dangerous place, but not all times. If you go to them, they will give you a chime to call them (you need to be alone, otherwise it will go on CD without summoning them).
They don't take gold as payment, as the undercity is not interested in paying taxes or etc. You require special tokens obtained doing shady stuff.
